column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////This was my first time at a ramen noodle restaurant
column2: so I don't have another great noodle place to compare it with. But I'll have to admit the setting of this restaurant was posh. We were greeted and seated immediately
column3: service was excellent! I order the spicy chicken ramen (chicken broth: chicken chashu
column7: green onions served with THIN noodles) Â for 10.95 . Loved the atmosphere
column8: food and workers will be going back soon!
